group_1.textRight: Alright, there’s no time to waste,@so we must buy these quickly.

group_1.textLeft: You’re extra worried about the time today,@Rabitan.
Did you have other plans for today, perhaps?

group_1.textRight: Huh?

group_1.textLeft: If that’s the case, then you may leave@the shopping to us…

group_1.textRight: …I can’t do that, I just know you’d mess@something up.

group_1.textLeft: You really don’t trust us…

group_1.textRight: If that’s how it is, then we gotta pull this@off flawlessly to get back at Rabitan!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, let's do that!@[chara:103701:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:103701:cheek_0][chara:103701:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:103701:lipSynch_1]But what should we be buying first...?

group_1.textRight: I knew I shouldn’t have brought you two along.
So, what do you want to make,@and how many portions?

group_1.textLeft: It’s Christmas, so I really would like to@go with a cake.
And I just want to make a whole lot of it,@with no set amount in mind.

group_1.textRight: Then…let’s start with the all-purpose@ingredients.
We'll buy as much wheat, cake flour, butter,@and other items as our budget allows.

group_1.textLeft: Since they’re of a long shelf life, would@it not be best to buy them in bulk?

group_1.textRight: You’re right, we likely won't need to use@up all of these today.
It’s better to have leftovers instead of@not enough.
However, we also have our budget to@consider.
And we cannot let things like eggs or@fruit go to waste, either.

group_1.textLeft: I understand...
Mikage?@What are you looking at?

group_1.textRight: Look at this poster.@It says that this store is gonna
hold a Christmas cosplay contest.

group_1.textLeft: Wow, it really fits the Christmas season,@seems quite fun.

group_1.textRight: We don’t have the time to be getting@distracted by this sort of thing.
[chara:103301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
Wait, this might be good...

group_1.textLeft: Rabi?

group_1.textRight: The prize for the pair category…have a look.

group_1.textLeft: …[wait:1.0][chara:103701:motion_400][chara:103701:cheek_0][chara:103701:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:103701:lipSynch_1]Oh!@A week's worth of the highest quality eggs?!

group_1.textRight: That's what you picked up on?!
I've come up with a great idea.
You two must enter this competition as Befana@and win this prize.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:103701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Ehh?!@What are you talking about?!

group_1.textRight: Alright, you got it!
We really gotta win this together, Nayutan!

group_1.textLeft: Where is that motivation coming from?!@This is way too embarrassing!!
Contests like these aren’t enjoyable if
one doesn’t feel that they’re up to it…

group_1.textRight: Please, don't worry.
I can guarantee that both you and Mikage@will win.

group_1.textLeft: A-and why...is that...?

group_1.textRight: It's alright, I'm certain that you'll win.@So come on, go.

group_1.textLeft: Rabi, are you perhaps...angry with us?
Is it because I’ve been so petulant all@morning
that you want to shame me with this@absurd request…?

group_1.textRight: No, I’m simply confident that you can win@this, Lady Nayuta.
I have no interest in embarrassing you@or anything of the sort.

group_1.textLeft: Uuugh...@Understood...
I really can’t tell for the life of me what@you’re thinking sometimes, Rabi…
